Articles.Content:
What are some cost effective 3D Printing companies, where I can send my file and have it be printed?

EDIT: Two years later and my local Library got a 3D Printer

Edited October 25, 2015 by musicpenguin

Last time I looked up 3d printing services on google there seemed to be plenty. Even some locally, which considering where I live I didn't really expect.

The only one I found giving pricing was one from the UK. I can't find it but I remember thinking it was fairly reasonable. I think a 12cm tall bust was something like $40 but don't quote me. It all depends on the amount of physical mass, so if you've got a design that's thick maybe get the computer model and hollow it out.

Going dark. Post removed.

Edited June 5, 2013 by dr_jt
Thanks! I think i'm going to print a kerbolnaut. If i do ill upload it.
